string-array.name: notificationMessages
string-array.item: Change your clothes and disinfect your mask!

string-array.name: dailyTips
string-array.item: Contact your local hospital if you think you have any COVID-19 symptom.
Refrain from using taxis or public transport.
Do not share bottles and silverware with others.
Be patient, vaccines are coming soon.
Keep a distance of at least 2 meters when communicating with people.
